title: 'Good Will Hunting' Landmarks Become Makeshift Memorials
teaser: Many Bostonians feel a special connection to Robin Williams, who made a lasting impression when filming there in 1997.
contentencoded:
Makeshift memorials of flowers and notes have popped up around the country to remember Robin Williams.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Andrea Shea of WBUR visited two iconic Boston locations from “Good Will Hunting,” the 1997 film that won Williams an Academy Award.
